abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Living Fire: Close Beings are Burning (d10). Illuminating: Sheds Light out to Near. Seep: It can enter the space of other Beings and openings as small as 1 inch without squeezing. Bestiary Bestiary 170 170 Elemental, Lesser Water TL: 3.9 Medium Primordial HD: 8 (36 HP) Speed: 0' (Swim 30') Zone: Midline Morale: 10 # Appearing: 1 Senses: Blindsense Armor: 3 [as Plate] Immune: Acid, Poison; Physical from non-Relics Weak: Shock Status Immunities: Fatigued, Prone, Sickened, Suffocating, Restrained ACTIONS Strike [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8) plus 4 (d8) if in water ABILITIES Waterbound: Must stay Near a body of water.
